name: Chaotic Maze (cDreyer)
description:
Cristian Dreyer: Programming. (Itch.io, GitHub)

Felipe Zummach : Animator and Level Designer.

Julia Vanti: Sound Designer, UI and HUD Designer, Character Designer, Cutscene  Designer, Environment Designer(Artstation, Instagram, Fiverr).

Leonardo Gomez: Environment Designer.

We are Game Developers from Feevale University, Brazil. All the art is originally made by Leonardo Gomez and Julia Vanti (you can access the links to her portifolios and pages). The music is also made by Julia Vanti, but the sound effects was taken from Freesound.org and Zapsplat.com. 

Advisors: 

Guilherme Theisen Schneider

André Benvenuti Trombetta  

Eduardo Fernando Müller  

Gustavo Bülow
